Flow.description: Generates prediction for opps created in remaining days of the month based on prior 3 months to calculate deals and users won
Flow.label: Forecasting: Magic Number Generator

recordCreates.name: Create_ARR_Forecasting_Adjustment_Best_Case
recordCreates.label: Create ARR Forecasting Adjustment Best Case

recordCreates.name: Create_Logos_Forecasting_Adjustment_Best_Case
recordCreates.label: Create Logos Forecasting Adjustment Best Case

recordCreates.name: Create_Software_Users_Forecasting_Adjustment_Best_Case
recordCreates.label: Create Software Users Forecasting Adjustment Best Case

recordCreates.name: Create_Software_Users_Forecasting_Adjustment_Commit
recordCreates.label: Create Software Users Forecasting Adjustment Commit

recordLookups.name: Get_Best_Case_Pipeline
recordLookups.label: Get Best Case Pipeline
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8

recordLookups.name: Get_Users_Commit_Pipeline
recordLookups.label: Get Users Commit Pipeline
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8

recordLookups.name: Payment_Opportunities
recordLookups.label: Payment Opportunities
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND (5 OR 6)

recordLookups.name: Software_Opportunities
recordLookups.label: Software Opportunities
recordLookups.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9) AND (5 OR 6) AND 10

fields.name: Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
Uh Oh

Something went wrong. Reach out in #help-sales-ops and reference this error message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Why_Forecast
fields.fieldText:
Why Forecast?

Forecasting is a critical part of our business. It enables us to plan and make informed decisions around future operations. Every level of our sales organization (including the rep, manager, VP, and CSO) submits forecast each week. Learn more in Highspot.

fields.name: Whats_a_Magic_Number
fields.fieldText:
What's a Magic Number?

We work in a high-velocity sales cycle, which means we are often forecasting based on deals that have not entered our pipeline yet. To help you forecast, the system automatically calculates a "magic number" that you can add to your current Commit and Best Case Pipeline.


The "magic number" is the average (for your Commit forecast) and max (for your Best Case forecast) number of deals created and closed in-month between calendar day 24 and the end of the month, based on your performance from the last 3 months. This means your magic numbers shrink as the month progresses. If you started or changed roles in the last 3 months, these numbers may not be accurate.


See below for your average and max performance based on the last 3 months.

fields.name: projection_summary
fields.fieldText: Your forecast is based on where you expect to finish at the end of the month. Below is prepopulated data, which adds a system-generated "magic number" to your current Commit and Best Case pipelines. This magic number estimates the number of deals that have yet to be created that will close in-month.

value.stringValue: [{"label":"Learn More","value":"Learn More","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","index":0},{"label":"New Month Forecast","value":"New Month Forecast","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","index":1},{"label":"Update This Month","value":"Update This Month","iconPosition":"left","variant":"neutral","index":2}]

fields.name: Thank_You_Text
fields.fieldText:
Thank you!

Your manager will sing your praises for getting your forecast in.
